name: Ranger
description: A warrior of the wilderness who uses martial prowess and nature magic to hunt foes.
hp_at_higher_levels: 1d10 (or 6) + your Constitution modifier per Ranger level after 1st

1.name: Favored Enemy
1.description: Choose a type of enemy to study; gain advantage on tracking and recalling information about it and learn a language it speaks.

1.name: Favored Foe
1.description: (Optional) Mark a target you hit to deal an extra 1d4 damage once per turn for up to 1 minute, a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus.

1.name: Natural Explorer
1.description: Choose a favored terrain; you and your group gain bonuses while traveling and for related checks there.

1.name: Deft Explorer
1.description: (Optional) Gain the Canny benefit: expertise in one skill and two extra languages, with more benefits at higher levels.

2.name: Fighting Style
2.description: Adopt a particular style of fighting such as Archery or Two-Weapon Fighting.

2.name: Spellcasting
2.description: Use Wisdom to cast ranger spells; you know two 1st-level spells and gain more as you level.

2.name: Spellcasting Focus
2.description: (Optional) You can use a druidic focus as a spellcasting focus for your ranger spells.

3.name: Ranger Archetype
3.description: Choose a ranger archetype that grants features at 3rd, 7th, 11th, and 15th levels.

3.name: Primeval Awareness
3.description: Expend a spell slot to sense if certain creature types are nearby for 1 minute per slot level.

3.name: Primal Awareness
3.description: (Optional) Learn themed spells like speak with animals and cast each once per long rest without using a slot.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

4.name: Martial Versatility
4.description: (Optional) Whenever you gain an Ability Score Improvement, you can replace a fighting style you know.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

6.name: Favored Enemy and Natural Explorer Improvement
6.description: Choose an additional favored enemy and favored terrain, gaining the associated benefits.

6.name: Deft Explorer: Roving
6.description: (Optional) Your speed increases by 5 feet, and you gain climbing and swimming speeds equal to your walking speed.

7.name: Ranger Archetype Feature
7.description: Gain a feature from your chosen ranger archetype.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

8.name: Land's Stride
8.description: Move through nonmagical difficult terrain without extra movement and gain advantages against plants that impede movement.

10.name: Hide in Plain Sight
10.description: Spend 1 minute crafting camouflage to gain +10 to Stealth while motionless and not taking actions.

10.name: Nature's Veil
10.description: (Optional) As a bonus action, become invisible until the start of your next turn, usable PB times per long rest.

10.name: Deft Explorer: Tireless
10.description: (Optional) As an action, gain temporary hit points and reduce exhaustion by 1 after a short rest.

11.name: Ranger Archetype Feature
11.description: Gain a feature from your chosen ranger archetype.

12.name: Ability Score Improvement
12.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

14.name: Vanish
14.description: Use the Hide action as a bonus action, and you can't be tracked by nonmagical means.

14.name: Favored Enemy Improvement
14.description: Choose one additional favored enemy and learn its language.

15.name: Ranger Archetype Feature
15.description: Gain a feature from your chosen ranger archetype.

16.name: Ability Score Improvement
16.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

18.name: Feral Senses
18.description: You are aware of the location of any invisible creature within 30 feet of you, and you don't suffer disadvantage when attacking unseen creatures.

19.name: Ability Score Improvement
19.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

20.name: Foe Slayer
20.description: Once on each of your turns, add your Wisdom modifier to the attack or damage roll against a favored enemy.
